question: Which company has commissioned India's first rooftop solar carport recently?
explanation: Tata Power Solar Systems has commissioned India's first rooftop solar carport at 70000 sq. mtr. Unity One Mall, in Rohini, Delhi. Solar carports are overhead canopies (mounted with solar panel) built to cover parking areas. This solar carport will make the mall self sufficient in terms of energy requirement. Besides, mall will also earn on the unused and excess solar electricity produced, by sending it to the local power grid.
